name: Techno Gladiator
description:
In this 2D top-down bullet hell game, battle robots in a dystopian Cyberpunk-themed city. Use WASD to walk, the left mouse button to shoot, and use Left Shift to use a one-time ability that slows down time briefly.

Designed and developed by Olivier Aartsen for the course Issues in Game Studies: Cyberpunk at the University of Klagenfurt.

Note that the HTML version may not work, in which case it is necessary to download the Windows Executable.
